title: Animation and Multimedia 3rd Edition

Computer/application software proficiency is an advantage for a person's advancement, productivity, and creativity to succeed in his entrepreneurial, career, and academic pursuits because computers play a vital role in every field.

title: The Man Who Died Twice
description: Elizabeth has received a letter from an old colleague, a man with whom she has a long history. He's made a big mistake, and he needs her help. His story involves stolen diamonds, a violent mobster, and a very real threat to his life.
